# [Interview #1069: WoR Signing Report - Awesomeness Summoned, Entry #5](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1069#5)

#### Question

If Hoid were to hold an unsheathed Nightblood, would he feel sick?

#### Brandon Sanderson

(Loud laughing) RAFO
